name: Workout logs maintenance
rules: Always log workouts in files named logs/workouts/YYYY-MM-workouts.md.
Use YYYY-MM-DD date format for all workout entries (follows general logging standards).
Ensure the Markdown table header (date | exercise | details) remains the first row.
Append one row per workout session; never reorder existing rows.
Include specific exercise details in the 'details' column (sets, reps, weight, duration, etc.).
If a monthly file is missing, create it using the standard header.
